body.name: MAONO Gaming USB Microphone, Noise Cancellation Condenser mic with Mute, Gain, Monitoring, Boom Arm for Streaming, Podcast, Twitch, YouTube, Discord, PC, Computer, PS4, PS5, Mac, GamerWave DGM20S
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 14 hrs 23 mins
features: MORE FOCUS AND CLARITY - This gaming microphone with one-click noise cancellation technology, which can effectively eliminate background noise. Whether it's multiplayer online games, cooperative games, or competitive games, the USB microphone can capture game players' voices clearly, thereby enhancing the collaboration and competitiveness of the game. Cardioid pickup focuses more on capturing sound from the mic front, providing better sound quality and accuracy for gaming streaming or voice.

CONTROLLABLE RGB LIGHTING - You can change the color of RGB lights to match your game streaming aesthetic. The computer microphone has 9 personalized RGB lighting modes, Soft and coordinated lighting effects make your gaming video or gaming live broadcast stand out from the crowd. Long-pressing the RGB button turns off the RGB lights, while a short press turn on the lights and adjusts the light color.

EASIER MULTIFUNCTION USE - One-click the mute button on top of the PC microphone to turn on mute mode, and you can easily control your game audio. Take control of your on-stream sound with the mic gain knob, you can check if your voice level is too high or too low and adjust accordingly. The zero-latency monitoring allows you to easily maintain professional sound quality with a gaming mic.

PLUG AND PLAY - The game streaming microphone is compatible with Windows PC computer laptop, Mac, and PS4/5. The gaming USB microphone is ready to capture it when inspiration strikes. Just plug the mic straight into your computer or laptop with the included USB and USB C cable, and you're all set to record or stream, right away, No drivers are required. (Note: Not compatible with XBOX)

STURDY & FLEXIBLE ARM STAND - The easy-to-position metal arm stand adjusts to support a variety of setups, You can quickly pull the podcast microphone near your mouth when in use, or fold it away to save more space. The shock mount can further reduce game-induced machine noise and vibration, and the removable pop filter can reduce noise without blocking the gaming computer screen.

WHAT YOU GET - The USB gaming PC microphone set package includes, USB condenser microphone*1, Metal Boom arm stand*1, Shock mount*1, Pop filter*1, USB and USB C cable*1, Desktop Clamp*1, User's Manual*1. We provide 24hr professional customer service and a 12-month warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MAONO Microphone DGM20S USB Gaming Microphone USB microphone designed for game enthusiasts

USB Condenser Microphone DGM20S Noise Cancellation Gaming Microphone Compact USB condenser mic made for game voice and streaming. The gaming mic with noise cancellation delivers an immersive and lifelike sound, with Up to 9 modes of cool RGB lights for true immersion. Features like mute, gain control, and zero latency monitoring add a new level of game experience

One-Key Noise Cancellation With ENC tech, anti-plosive and stereo capabilities, crisp & accurate sound reproduction Natural-Sounding Voice Cardioid pickup, delivers incredibly clear & smooth sound for games. Best pick-up range: 6-12"

Previous page Cool Game Atmosphere Multiple RGB lighting with new of game immersion Long press to turn off the RGB light Zero-Latency Monitoring Make sure your game voice and streams sound great Next page 1 RGB Lights 2 Zero Latency Monitoring

One-Tap Mute One-click the mute button on top of the PC microphone to turn on mute mode, and you can easily control your game streaming audio Mic Gain Control Take control of your on-game stream sound with the mic gain knob, you can check if your voice level is too high or too low and adjust accordingly
Previous page Compatible with PC, Computer, Mac, PS4, PS5 Solid and heavy-duty metal arm stand Next page 1 Plug and Play 2 Sturdy & Flexible Stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price
reviews.reviewText: all the features are great. go it so I could stop using a headset when playing with friends. I was worried about echoing but as long as the directional feature is on it works great and they rarely hear echos (the positioning of where I keep it can sometimes cause the echo). easy to use, easy to assemble, and I can keep it on low because the mic has no problem picking up my voice. amazing, would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great, Microphone, Great Quality And Perfect for on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good starting mic
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The arm lost sturdiness after about a month, has to be readjusted a lot or doesn’t hold certain positions.Had some issues with the RGB lights and touch-to-mute / light settings buttons, and it was randomly changing colors and muting itself. Resolved after some messing with.Sounds okay overall but occasional fuzziness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cool device ,setup was easy..works very well with a few other devices .. app was easy to install..hopefully It last a lifetime..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s worth it
reviews.reviewText: It’s only day 1 but so far so good. I wrapped it with a rose vine so it blends in with my plants better that way the stand doesn’t stick out like a sore thumb and it’s giving the vibe I want, there was somebody else who did the same thing in the reviews and it was so cute that it inspired me to do the same. I’m really happy with my purchase. My friends say they can hear me very clear and I use this microphone with my ps5 headset for Twitch streaming. It’s a nice mic that doesn’t break the piggy bank. There’s also an app you can download on your computer to update the microphone as well to tweak the noise cancelation if that’s something you wanted to do as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good looking usb microphone good sound quality I look the lights that this has and the features that is induced. Good for gaming or podcast. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice product, excellent sound! However the noise cancellation tool is just available to window OS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Son Loves It!
reviews.reviewText: My 12 year old uses this for gaming and creating content on his YouTube channel. It stays in place and is colorful. He says it works great!
